title: New Year's sales 2021: the best deals from Walmart, Best Buy, and Amazon
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: New Year's savings on TVs, Fitbits, appliances, and more
article: Ring in 2021 with epic New Year's sales from your favorite retailers like Walmart, Best Buy, and Amazon. You can find incredible deals on last year's best-selling items, which include TVs, laptops, mattresses, appliances, smartwatches, fitness equipment, and so much more. To help you find all the top offers, we've rounded up the best New Year's sales for you just below. Some highlighted bargains include the all-new Fitbit Sense on sale for $270, the top-rated Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones marked down to an all-time low price of $278, and a $50 price cut on the powerful Apple iPad Pro. You'll also find New Year's home deals like the Farberware air fryer on sale for just $53 and a massive $250 discount on the iRobot Roomba i6+ robot vacuum. Shop more of the best New Year's sales below – and make sure to bookmark this page, as we'll be continuously updating it with all the top deals in the new year.
